abstract: T-Mobile plans to unveil the first phone based on Google’s mobile software on Sept. 23 in New York.
snippet: T-Mobile plans to unveil the first phone based on Google’s mobile software on Sept. 23 in New York.
lead_paragraph: T-Mobile said Tuesday that it would introduce details of the first and much-anticipated mobile phone based on Google’s Android software on Sept. 23 at a news conference in New York.

headline.main: First Google Phone to Be Announced Sept. 23
